Uses of Package
wissim.controller.filters.gui

  • Packages that use wissim.controller.filters.gui 
    Package Description
    wissim.controller.filters.gui  
    wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor  
    wissim.ui  
  • Classes in wissim.controller.filters.gui used by wissim.controller.filters.gui 
    Class and Description
    AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport
    Helper class, holding, for each row and filter (editor or user defined), a bit defining whether it is filtered in or out.
    AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle
    Helper class to handle an editor.
    AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo
    Class to hold the filter information on a single row.
    This information is a bit per column, defining whether the column is filtered out or not
    AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter
    Defines a column in the RowInfo, associated to a filter.
    AutoChoices 
    ChoiceRenderer 
    ChoicesHandler 
    ChoicesHandler.RowEntry
    Basic RowFilter.Entry instance, used internally to handle the RowFilter default filtering.
    CustomChoice 
    CustomChoiceDecorator 
    FiltersHandler 
    FiltersHandler.AutoSelector
    Class performing the auto selection.
    IFilterEditor 
    IFilterHeaderObserver 
    IParserModel 
    Look 
    ParserModel.TypeFormat 
    PositionHelper 
    TableFilterHeader 
    TableFilterHeader.FilterColumnsControllerPanel
    Class setting up together all the column filters
    Note that, while the TableFilterHeader handles columns using their model numbering, the FilterColumnsControllerPanel manages the columns as they are sorted in the Table.
    TableFilterHeader.FilterColumnsControllerPanel.FilterColumnPanel
    Class controlling the filter applied to one specific column
    It resizes itself automatically as the associated table column is resized.
    TableFilterHeader.Position
    Location of the header in relation to the table
